title: Been banned for unfair reasons?
body:
Alright, so a few days ago I was perm suspended... I will admit I've been toxic at times, and I've done things that may be uncalled for. But when I went threw the 3 games that I was banned for there was 2 or 3 things that were even remotely toxic. ON TOP OF THAT I have not even had a suspension on this account or a mute before... EVER! please riot look into my case! I need help.
Game 1
FreeloV2: Ganking comes harder for me, until level 6.
FreeloV2: I have support masteries on rn
FreeloV2: For tankiness lmao
FreeloV2: Twitch work on leeshing lmaoi
FreeloV2: gj
FreeloV2: 3 times, bot got 2, mid got half of one
FreeloV2: Lol, We are tilting you and getting easy kills. how is camping u bad?
FreeloV2: ty
FreeloV2: fucked
FreeloV2: i'm ganking him again fuck this kid he's anoyying
FreeloV2: "You won't win later." he said. "it'd be easy." he said
FreeloV2: i got 87 gold from him
FreeloV2: you're worth 300 gold again!
FreeloV2: rekt
FreeloV2: relax.
FreeloV2: servers are crashing
FreeloV2: lol
FreeloV2: baited.
FreeloV2: nice ulty!
FreeloV2: i procked you kills
FreeloV2: Scoreboard
FreeloV2: So is your father, and that's why you came out.
FreeloV2: LOL
FreeloV2: i saved you, didn't want her trash talking
FreeloV2: get fucked %%%

Game 2
FreeloV2: Yeah man, you too.
FreeloV2: yo wtf is that shit a 274?
FreeloV2: don't have eniough
FreeloV2: Nah, we're good
FreeloV2: Not worth it?
FreeloV2: JAX
FreeloV2: this is retarded.
FreeloV2: jax why go over wall instead of just helping me while i got dove?
FreeloV2: My bad
FreeloV2: see
FreeloV2: if iu don't stand behind minions i get binded
FreeloV2: fucking gay
FreeloV2: jax we rlly need a gank, btw nice steal
FreeloV2: gj jax, ty
FreeloV2: good shit!
FreeloV2: Ali, lets just get some farm for this cull ;)
FreeloV2: lb, why you solo pushing?
FreeloV2: just lost us mid kiddo.
FreeloV2: and most likely the game
FreeloV2: because they opened our base before 20
FreeloV2: Fed hard enough?
FreeloV2: 4/1?
FreeloV2: 4/4?
FreeloV2: 2/2?"
FreeloV2: 1 PERSON
FreeloV2: HAD A BAD GAME
FreeloV2: STFU
FreeloV2: GROUP
FreeloV2: do a 4 man pick on dar
FreeloV2: i'll hold mid
FreeloV2: Leblanc, okay report me for standing up to a kid picking on a kid with a bad game
FreeloV2: LB
FreeloV2: COM,E
FreeloV2: that tower
FreeloV2: nah lb, you're getting reported for assisting other team
FreeloV2: you pick on jax and purposly leabe team
FreeloV2: 2 times you lost us towers and inhibs
FreeloV2: after entire team told you
FreeloV2: to back and help
FreeloV2: Yes
FreeloV2: Which will prove my report
FreeloV2: We'll see.
FreeloV2: gg :D|
FreeloV2: Was well played!

replies.body:
yeah, this was totally fair. you are deluded of what is/isn't acceptable.

now you wish for us to believe that you didn't get punished before?

hard luck.
Nah dude, if you're saying this is reasonable.... then the professional players wishing cancer upon others is def not reasonable and riot should be more fair.

why bring the pros in?

this is about you, not them.

plus pros don't get any better treatment than you. They also get fined for toxic behavior.

You skip punishment tiers for hate speech.
FreeloV2: get fucked %%%
FreeloV2: fucking gay
FreeloV2: this is retarded.

The toxicity isn't bad, but Riot is particularly harsh on this kind of thing.
EDIT: I mean to say beyond the hate speech, like that is really the only thing wrong from skimming it.
Is there any way to get unbanned?

If you were banned and it was an error on Riot's part then you can create a ticket and they will lift the suspension, however since you were using hate speech it would not be considered an error. Nothing stopping you from trying though.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Logs or gtfo.

I am amazed by the incredibly toxic, hateful, whiny crap that people insist is "nothing wrong".

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KAu8d3r6,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-15T00:12:34.178+0000)
>
> Logs or gtfo.
> 
> I am amazed by the incredibly toxic, hateful, whiny crap that people insist is "nothing wrong".

I posted my logs ;)
Totally deserving of a tempban/restriction, if not a ban. I suspect you are lying and have already gotten multiple warning punishments, and simply ignored them.

https://support.riotgames.com
if you feel the punishment was unjust
submit a ticket
ask for a riot staff to post your logs as well, also they may of be help in determing your punishment
How do I submit a ticket?

The rules here are 
chat logs or it didn't happen

1. Post your chat logs (entire unedited).
2. Extreme instances of negative behavior can result in escalation to 2week or permaban status. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286
